remarks: Convert ~ mapdh9a to use the ` HDMap1 ` notation.  (Contributed by NM, 15-May-2015.)
statement:
hdmap1eu.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hdmap1eu.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmap1eu.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
hdmap1eu.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` U ) $.
hdmap1eu.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` U ) $.
hdmap1eu.c $e |- C = ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmap1eu.d $e |- D = ( Base ` C ) $.
hdmap1eu.l $e |- L = ( LSpan ` C ) $.
hdmap1eu.m $e |- M = ( ( mapd ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmap1eu.i $e |- I = ( ( HDMap1 ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmap1eu.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hdmap1eu.mn $e |- ( ph -> ( M ` ( N ` { X } ) ) = ( L ` { F } ) ) $.
hdmap1eu.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. ( V \ { .0. } ) ) $.
hdmap1eu.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. D ) $.
hdmap1eu.t $e |- ( ph -> T e. V ) $.
hdmap1eu $p |- ( ph -> E! y e. D A. z e. V ( -. z e. ( ( N ` { X } ) u. ( N ` { T } ) ) -> y = ( I ` <. z , ( I ` <. X , F , z >. ) , T >. ) ) ) $.
$d .0. y z $.
$d C y z $.
$d D y z $.
$d F y z $.
$d L y z $.
$d M y z $.
$d N y z $.
$d T y z $.
$d U y z $.
$d V y z $.
$d X y z $.
$d ph y z $.
